mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.url AS "url", a.activity_id AS "activityId", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", o4.name AS "office.name", ta.title AS "activity.title"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o4 ON o4.id = a.office_id left join tbl_activity ta on ta.id=a.activity_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_activity_link ( id, url, activity_id, office_id, del_flag, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{url}, #{activity.id}, #{office.id}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id" FROM tbl_activity_link a
WHERE a.activity_id = #{activity.id} and a.office_id=#{office.id}
